summary:
In case you haven’t heard, there is a new terminal emulator that hit the scene, called Ghostty.  It is the creation of Mitchell Hashimoto, the co-founder of Hashicorp.  While this terminal emulator by Mitchell’s own words is not supposed to be revolutionary in itself, it is a breath of fresh air as a really great …
The post Install Ghostty in Windows using WSL appeared first on Virtualization Howto...
title: Install Ghostty in Windows using WSL
